recommendations: Scott Kenwright
Data Reporting Analyst
July 18, 2017, Scott worked with Daniel D. in different groups

I worked with Daniel for a short amount of time and was new to the Scrum process. Not being familiar with Scrum, Daniel made me feel like I was an expert from day one. Daniels willingness to take time and explain where the team was going and why we were doing things the way we planned. This characteristic shows that he is very good at what he does. I have worked with numerous people during my career but never an individual like Daniel. His enthusiasm to move the project forward despite numerous obstacles is remarkable! Anywhere Daniel goes; great things are going to happen in any company environment.Daniel has a great attitude and outlook on life; he is also a very talented musician.Daniel is a true friend and I hope to have the opportunity to work alongside him in the future!
Scott Kenwright

Fred Yu
Director of Application Development at TrendShift
March 25, 2017, Daniel D. worked with Fred in the same group

I've worked with a number of different scrum masters in the past, but none who generated the type of enthusiasm and energy like Daniel. He and others worked tirelessly to craft a company culture that was collaborative and promoted personal accountability.He was constantly looking for ways to improve the process or team in incremental ways. He posted articles and shared his insight to allow team members to digest different viewpoints and approaches to agile development - helping to promote buy in. I really miss working with Daniel and hope we get the opportunity to do so again in the future. He will be a positive addition to any team. Want to transform an underperforming team? Want to make a good team better? Hire Daniel. You won't be disappointed.
Fred Yu

SugarCRM developer at Levementum
March 29, 2017, Daniel D. was senior to Janaki but didn’t manage directly

Janaki is a phenomenal developer in every aspect.  Any time that there was a complex issue that was difficult to code around, Janaki would rise to the occasion and develop a smart and viable solution. Janaki is also an excellent coach and mentor, and inspires the junior devs with patience and enthusiasm.  My favorite thing about having Janaki on a team is his unwavering good will and happy disposition.  Its contagious!  Janaki makes work a fun and happy place.  I would hire Janaki again without a second thought.  He is one of the best there is and will be an incredible asset to any team that he joins.

summary: Daniel has become an expert of directing operations through a career of managing complex technology projects for global and fortune 500 companies.  Daniel is passionate about culture as well as continuous improvement, and has the unique ability to gain the loyalty of employees while teaching them how to maximize their efficiency. Daniel has worked in technology for over 12 years.
